definitions.definition: A work , such as a blanket , composed of many different colors and shapes, sewn together to make an interesting whole.
Any kind of creation that makes use of many different aspects to create one whole piece.
examples: Bill took all of his poetry and put it together in a folder. It made up a patchwork of his life.

definitions.definition: A state of regulations whose constituents have an opaque scope of application because of their questionable delimitation with regard to each other.

main_definition: A work , such as a blanket , composed of many different colors and shapes, sewn together to make an interesting whole.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Any kind of creation that makes use of many different aspects to create one whole piece.
( derogatory ) A state of regulations whose constituents have an opaque scope of application because of their questionable delimitation with regard to each other.
